mainTitle: Data Collection and Processing in Health
mainParagraph: Patient Records: Personal information, medical history, treatment details. Operational Data: Staff schedules, financial records, operational metrics. Digital Health Services: Telemedicine, electronic health records (EHRs), health apps.

bestPractices.title: Patient Consent:
bestPractices.description: Obtain explicit consent for data collection and processing.

bestPractices.title: Confidentiality:
bestPractices.description: Ensure patient information is kept confidential and accessed only by authorized personnel.

bestPractices.title: Data Security:
bestPractices.description: Use encryption and secure access controls to protect data.

bestPractices.title: Compliance:
bestPractices.description: Adhere to health data protection regulations (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA).

bestPractices.title: Incident Response:
bestPractices.description: Develop and implement a data breach response plan.

bestPractices.title: Patient Rights:
bestPractices.description: Inform patients about their data rights, including access and correction.

benefits: Enhances trust between patients and healthcare providers.
Ensures compliance with health data protection laws.
